TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CreatingCookieEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供任何值事件處理常式。The class supplies values to any event handler. 藉由使用這個類別的屬性，您可以擷取使用者認證，當您建立自訂驗證 cookie。By using the properties of this class, you can retrieve user credentials when you create a custom authentication cookie. 類別會引發時已驗證的使用者認證之後，它會設定驗證 cookie，事件。The class raises the event when it sets the authentication cookie, after the user credentials have been authenticated. 類別的建構物件，並將它傳遞給任何事件處理常式。The class constructs a object and passes it to any event handler. 擷取使用者認證，透過 ，和屬性。You retrieve the user credentials through the , and properties. 屬性可包含任何您需要以進行驗證，例如身分證號碼的自訂值。The property can contain any custom values that you need in order to authenticate, such as an identification number. 屬性會指出驗證 cookie 是否應保留過去的目前工作階段。The property indicates whether the authentication cookie should be retained past the current session. 設定屬性，以`true`如果您建立驗證 cookie，以便類別不會建立 cookie。Set the property to `true` if you create the authentication cookie, so that the class does not create the cookie. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 處理常式會擷取中的使用者值物件自訂驗證 cookie。The handler retrieves user values from the object to customize the authentication cookie. 處理常式會將儲存的值中的驗證票證和集合的屬性屬性設`true`表示已建立驗證 cookie。The handler saves the value from the property in the authentication ticket and sets the property to `true` to indicate that the authentication cookie has been created. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs/cs/Global.asax#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs/vb/Global.asax#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CookieIsSet { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CookieIsSet : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示是否已建立驗證 Cookie。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the authentication cookie has been created.

value.span: 如果已建立驗證 Cookie 則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the authentication cookie was created; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別檢查屬性來判斷是否已建立驗證 cookie。The class checks the property to determine whether the authentication cookie has been created. 您將此值設定為`true`如果您的事件處理常式中建立驗證 cookie事件。You set this value to `true` if you create an authentication cookie in an event handler for the event. 如果設定為`false`（預設值），類別會建立驗證 cookie，這會覆寫任何您已建立的處理常式中的 cookie事件。If is set to `false` (the default value), the class creates an authentication cookie, This overwrites any cookie that you have created in the handler for the event. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 處理常式會擷取中的使用者值物件自訂驗證 cookie。The handler retrieves user values from the object to customize the authentication cookie. 屬性設定為`true`建立驗證票證之後。The property is set to `true` after the authentication ticket is created. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs/cs/Global.asax#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs/vb/Global.asax#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CustomCredential As String
public: property System::String ^ CustomCredential { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得使用者所提供的其他驗證值。

span.span: Gets additional authentication values that are provided by the user.

value.span: 驗證需要使用者名稱和密碼以外的自訂值。

span.span: The custom values required for authentication, other than user name and password.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用來擷取驗證票證中的自訂值的屬性。You use the property to retrieve custom values in the authentication ticket. 屬性包含值傳遞至方法。The property contains the value passed to the method. 一般而言，這個屬性用來傳遞使用的使用者名稱和密碼，例如身分證號碼都必須進行驗證的自訂值。Typically, this property is used to pass custom values that must be validated with the user name and password, such as an identification number. 如果多個值儲存在屬性中，您必須剖析屬性，就可以擷取值。If more than one value is stored in the property, you must parse the property in order to retrieve values. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 處理常式會擷取中的使用者值物件以自訂驗證 cookie。The handler retrieves user values from the object in order to customize the authentication cookie. 傳入的值屬性會儲存在的表單驗證票證的屬性。The value passed in the property is stored in the property of the forms authentication ticket. > [!NOTE] > 存放區只有在您知道屬性中的資料不是機密時，才在 cookie 中的屬性。Store the property in a cookie only when you know that the data in the property is not sensitive. 惡意使用者可以存取 cookie 中的值。Malicious users can access the values in the cookie. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs/cs/Global.asax#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs/vb/Global.asax#2)]

public: property bool IsPersistent { bool get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得值，指出驗證 Cookie 是否應保留至目前工作階段以後。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the authentication cookie should be retained beyond the current session.

value.span: 如果 Cookie 應保留至目前工作階段以後，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the cookie should be retained beyond the current session; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立物件，您可以使用屬性來指定驗證 cookie，是否要保留目前的工作階段以後。When you create a object, you can use the property to specify whether the authentication cookie is retained beyond the current session. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 處理常式會擷取中的使用者值物件以自訂驗證 cookie。The handler retrieves user values from the object in order to customize the authentication cookie. 的屬性物件設定中的值為屬性。The property of the object is set to the value in the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs/cs/Global.asax#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs/vb/Global.asax#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Password As String
public: property System::String ^ Password { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Gets the password for the user.

value.span: 使用者提供用於驗證的密碼。

span.span: The password that is provided by the user for authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用屬性來擷取密碼，當您設定自訂的值中的驗證票證。You use the property to retrieve the password when you set custom values in the authentication ticket. > [!NOTE] > 不會將值儲存驗證票證中的屬性。Do not save the value of the property in the authentication ticket. 惡意使用者可以存取 cookie，並擷取密碼，即使加密 cookie。A malicious user can access the cookie and retrieve the password even though the cookie is encrypted.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UserName As String

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Gets the name for the user.

value.span: 驗證使用者所提供的名稱。

span.span: The name that is provided by the user for authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用屬性，以擷取驗證名稱，當您設定自訂的值中的驗證票證。You use the property to retrieve the authentication name when you set custom values in the authentication ticket. 一般而言，您設定的屬性物件到值。Typically, you set the property of the object to the value. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 處理常式會擷取中的使用者值物件自訂驗證 cookie。The handler retrieves user values from the object to customize the authentication cookie. 屬性設定的值為屬性。The property is set to the values of the property.
